Students caught red-handed while cheating, video goes viral of this UP's exam

A shocking case of cheating has emerged from a college in Barabanki, Uttar Pradesh, where students were caught blatantly copying during an LLB examination. A viral video circulating on social media depicts students openly cheating in the presence of teachers.

In the video, students are seen with guides and cheat sheets, writing answers on their desks during the exam. The situation escalated into a commotion, with reports of a fight breaking out.

Authorities swiftly responded to the incident. A total of 26 students were apprehended for cheating during the examination. Additionally, 12 students were caught cheating at Avadh La College and 25 at TRC during the second shift of exams.
